attributes.action: Make school days start later than 9am so students can get full rest
attributes.additional_details: Make it so that schools can start later
attributes.background: To make schools start later than 9am as this would be benificial for students as they would be able to get a full nights rest and this would reduce stress and anxiety and increase productivity in lessons as they will be able to concentrate better and get higher marks.

rejection.details:
The length of the school day and time that school start are decisions for schools and their governing bodies to make.

If you would like the Department for Education to issue guidelines, or impose requirements on schools, about the length of the school day you could start a petition asking for that.
